import React, { useState } from 'react' export default function Contact (props){ const [isClicked, setIsClicked] = useState() const {farmer} = props //when you click on contact a contact form will show up that is connected to js email and the farmer will be contacted. //idea: have a verbal recording that can be done to attach to the contact email for the user to leave a voice message. const handleClick = ()=>{ isClicked? setIsClicked(false) : setIsClicked(true) } return ( <> {isClicked?

{farmer}

:
} ) }
